title: Polearm Master
content: Warlocks who can't use CHA on the Bonus Action attack. The Bonus Attack deals minimal damage and the better benefit from this feat is the Opportunity Attack when combined with the Sentinel. When someone enters your attack range, you will get an Opportunity Attack while a reach weapon is equipped, and the Sentinel feat will be able to stop their movement before they get into their melee range of you (unless they also have a reach weapon).
